title: Jesse Jackson, Jr. Collects $8,700 Per Month in Disability Payments?
subtitle: Does imprisoned former Congressmember Jesse Jackson, Jr., stand to collect $8,700 per month in disability payments and $45,000 per year in Congressional pension?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Imprisoned former Congressmember Jesse Jackson, Jr. stands to collect $8,700 per month in disability payments and $45,000 per year in Congressional pension.
